title: PrestaShop
description: PrestaShop is an e-commerce platform characterized by its vibrant and diverse color palette, featuring shades such as magenta (DF0067), deep navy (251B5B), cyan (25B9D7), honey yellow (FBBB22), muted blue-grey (68737F), and light grey (BBBFC3). The brand colors are officially referenced from PrestaShop's media kit available on their website.
